column4: Thanks for letting me know about the BigMC issue.  Did the user in question manage to get things working, do you know?
I fixed their problem but I think they left before I found the solution :\
He emailed me and I told him to use the latest version with the fix anyway so hopefully he gets it working.
Ah, were we trying to get an old version working hehe?
I was mostly terrified at the idea of some poor soul using my flaky research software working :p
Ohh, I see. LOL my bad :P
Well, in fairness, I have no idea where he would even have obtained the old version, given that the website (as far as I know...) only includes a link to the newest version on Github.  *shrug* :)
I think we got it from a website
Let me scroll up and get the exact link
That's the link he/she posted and I got that old version from heeh
Oh, whoops.  Yes, the manual would appear to be out of date.  I should fix that.
Anyway, thanks a bunch for helping to support my flaky software :p
